statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_metrics;
SELECT id, customer_id, product_id FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE infection_rate > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, reported_date FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, infection_rate, reported_date FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE customer_id = '9c48b3dd-8b4f-4a8f-bb25-038ec386ca14';
SELECT id, infection_rate, reported_date FROM quality_control_metrics ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS total_entries FROM quality_control_metrics GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(infection_rate) AS average_infection_rate FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_metrics WHERE product_id IN ('3fb1bfc3-3225-46be-983e-967db052372a', 'bb35e496-5a68-4754-835e-69ec8c1facc2') AND infection_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY reported_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates ORDER BY infection_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, infection_type FROM InfectionRates WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT infection_type, COUNT(*) FROM InfectionRates GROUP BY infection_type
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates WHERE infection_type = 'COVID-19';
SELECT id, infection_type FROM InfectionRates WHERE infection_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_infections FROM InfectionRates GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM infection_rate WHERE infection_type = 'COVID-19';
SELECT rate, date FROM infection_rate WHERE rate >= 1.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, patient_id, infection_type FROM infection_rate WHERE patient_id = 10 AND rate < 1 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT inspector, quality_rating FROM quality_control WHERE batch_id = 100 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM report WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM infection_rate WHERE rate > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, infection_type FROM infection_rate WHERE patient_id = 1234
SELECT date, rate FROM infection_rate WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rate DESC
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE quality_rating >= 3 AND inspector = 'John Doe'
SELECT report_id, date, details FROM report ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates WHERE id = 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT infection_type, infection_date FROM InfectionRates WHERE infection_type = 'COVID-19';
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates ORDER BY infection_date DESC, id ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 40
SELECT hospital_name, capacity, location FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY hospital_name
SELECT infection_type, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM InfectionRates GROUP BY infection_type
SELECT analyzed_by, result, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM InfectionRates;
SELECT country, infection_rate FROM InfectionRates WHERE infection_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM Reports GROUP BY hospital_id HAVING total_reports > 10;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT country, AVG(infection_rate) AS avg_rate FROM InfectionRates GROUP BY country;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE status = 'positive' AND date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_name, infection_type, severity FROM Patients p JOIN Infections i ON p.patient_id = i.patient_id WHERE p.age > 50;
